rows.label: qst104202_msg0001
rows.name:
So it looks like the building
repairs should go just fine?
Excellent! On to the next phase!

rows.label: qst104202_msg0002
rows.name:
We need to gather great
teachers from across Alst!

rows.label: qst104202_msg0003
rows.name:
Language! From basic literacy
through to detailed literary
analysis and composition...

rows.label: qst104202_msg0004
rows.name:
Our children must be raised to enjoy
rich communication with others!

rows.label: qst104202_msg0005
rows.name:
Sciences! From the workings of
everyday objects to the
calculations used in business...

rows.label: qst104202_msg0006
rows.name:
Our children should master
all kinds of knowledge to
widen their horizons!

rows.label: qst104202_msg0007
rows.name:
History! None of us would be
here today were it not for the
efforts of our ancestors.

rows.label: qst104202_msg0008
rows.name:
By learning of the triumphs and failures
of the past, our children will gain the
wisdom to forge a brighter future!

rows.label: qst104202_msg0009
rows.name:
I'm sorry to foist this all on you, but
I'd like you to use your judgment to
find the most suitable candidates.

rows.label: qst104202_msg0010
rows.name:
I'd like you to use your
judgment to find the most
suitable candidates.

rows.label: qst104202_msg0011
rows.name:
You've traveled many more places and
met many more people than me. If anyone
can find us teachers, it's you.

rows.label: qst104202_msg0101
rows.name:
We could always find teachers locally,
but I want to provide an education to
match that of the Acedian Academy.

rows.label: qst104202_msg0102
rows.name:
Perhaps one day, even children from
outside could gather here in Iyasaki
in order to pursue a better education!

rows.label: qst104202_msg0201
rows.name: Fantastic!

rows.label: qst104202_msg0202
rows.name:
So, where are these
teachers you've found?

rows.label: qst104202_msg0203
rows.name:
Ah... They're all still making
preparations to travel here?

rows.label: qst104202_msg0204
rows.name:
Oh dear... I may have been a
little hasty in my assumptions.

rows.label: qst104202_msg0205
rows.name:
Well, when I heard you'd arrived,
I thought you must have brought the
new teachers with you, you see.

rows.label: qst104202_msg0206
rows.name:
So I already gathered the children
together so we could have ourselves
an inaugural lesson.

rows.label: qst104202_msg0207
rows.name: Now I feel a little silly...

rows.label: qst104202_msg0208
rows.name:
Hey, I had a brainwave! Perhaps our
very own Rex-sensei can give the
kids a little practice lesson!

rows.label: qst104202_msg0209
rows.name:
He's the biggest success story this
village has produced, after all!

rows.label: qst104202_msg0210
rows.name: I'll call the kids over, then!
